Query: select i.name as Item, sum(sid.quantity * sid.unit_price) as Sales, sum(sid.quantity * sid.unit_cost) as Costs from sales_invoice as si left join sales_invoice_detail as sid on si.id_sales_invoice = sid.id_sales_invoice left join items as i on i.id_item = sid.id_item where si.trans_date between * $StartDate * and * $EndDate * and si.id_company = 1 group by sid.id_item order by sum(sid.quantity) desc limit 10
Caption: Top 10 Items
Label: Item
